abstract: Joan Raymond Frequent Flier column on Ralph Bower, chief operating officer of Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen, who became ill on a flight and encountered rudeness.
snippet: Ralph Bower, chief operating officer of Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen, became ill on a flight and encountered rudeness.
lead_paragraph: Ralph Bower, chief operating officer of Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen, became ill on a flight and encountered rudeness.

headline.main: Ailing on a Plane, to Little Sympathy
headline.print_headline: Ailing on a Plane, to Little Sympathy
headline.seo: Popeyes Executive, Ailing on a Plane, Finds Little Sympathy
